name: Crf First Choice Inc.
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Crf First Choice Inc. is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Intellectual and/or Developmental Disabilities provider based in Connersville, IN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $77.1M in Medicaid payments across 46K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $77.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
